data.event: The theme selected by the World AIDS Campaign is "Stop AIDS: Keep the Promise" as it will be through 2010.
The government announced on Friday an allocation of CNY860 million for AIDS prevention and control.

event.title: Friday, United States President George W. Bush urged

data.event: Friday, United States President George W. Bush urged the United States Congress to double the 2003 Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief to US$30 billion over the next five years.

event.title: will travel to sub-Saharan Africa early next year

data.event: "I'm pleased to announce that Laura and I will travel to sub-Saharan Africa early next year," Bush said.

event.title: nearly three-quarters of AIDS-related deaths during 2006

data.event: Sub-Saharan Africa suffered nearly three-quarters of AIDS-related deaths during 2006 and is home to two-thirds of those living with HIV/AIDS.
